The preferred airport for Merriot Hotel is Banja Luka (BNX-Banja Luka Intl.) - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi
Description:
Property Location
A stay at Merriot Hotel places you in the heart of Banja Luka, a 4-minute drive from Banja Luka Castle and 6 minutes from Park Petar Kocic. This hotel is 1.6 mi (2.5 km) from Orthodox Sanctuary of Christ the Savior and 2.6 mi (4.1 km) from Grand Trade Banja Luka.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 27 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment.

Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include a hair salon and shopping on site.

Dining
At Merriot Hotel, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and multilingual staff.
HotelFacilities: 24-hour front desk Bar/lounge Free breakfast Hair salon Multilingual staff Number of floors - 3 Restaurant Shopping on site Total number of rooms - 27

Description:
This elegant villa is located in Trn, just off the E661 expressway and 10 km away from Banja Lukas centre. It offers a stylish restaurant and luxuriously decorated rooms with cable TV.

Free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and soundproofed windows are standard room facilities at Hotel Villa Viktorija. Each room is fitted with a minibar, and some also include a kitchenette. Room service is available from 07:00 to 23:00.

The restaurant at Viktorija Villa serves a good range of international food, including pizzas and pasta, fish specialities, steaks, schnitzels and several salads. The menu also offers plenty of traditional local food.

Free private parking is available on site. The distance to Banja Luka International Airport is 15 km. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Hotel St.Georgije is centrally located in historic Banja Luka, 1 km away from the citys theatre. Massage services are available to guests and the hotel has a terrace and a garden.

Rooms at Hotel St.Georgije have air conditioning, stylish, modern décor and hard wood floors.  A mini bar and TV with satellite channels are provided. All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower.

A la carte breakfast is served daily. The hotel also has dry cleaning, laundry and ironing facilities, and a 24-hour front desk. There is Wi-Fi available free of charge throughout the hotel. A coffee bar is located on site.

Banja Lukas mediaeval castle, which is located on the left bank of the Vrbas River, is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. The tree-lined Vrbas River can be reached on foot in 5 minutes. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Set in Banja Luka, Hotel Damjan features a bar and free WiFi. This 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, and some units at Hotel Damjan have a terrace. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Slatina is 14 km from the accommodation.

Description: Facilities and services include a 24 hrs reception, breakfast area and coffee bar.The rooms are equipped with TV, telephone and minibar.Address: ul.Husrefa Redzica 1, 77000 Bihac, Bosnia and Herzegovina.

Hotel Kostelski Buk is located in Kostela, 8 km from Bihac. This elegantly furnished hotel is surrounded by untouched nature and set right next to Una waterfalls. There are a bar and restaurant on site, while free Wi-Fi is provided.

Rooms are modernly furnished and air-conditioned. They offer a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a wardrobe. Private bathroom provides a shower and hairdryer. Some rooms also have a balcony.

The restaurant serves traditional Bosnian specialties, as well as international dishes. There is also a souvenir shop on site. Laundry and ironing services are available and there is a safety deposit box at the reception.

National Park Una can be reached in 60 km. Rafting on Una River can be organised next to the hotel, while the Una regatta takes place every summer and passes by the hotel. Plitvice Lakes, in Croatia, can be reached in 57 km.

Main Bus Station can be found in Bihac, 8 km away. Guests can also visit Bihacs Captain Tower or enjoy local delicacies at one of many local restaurants and grills. Zagreb International Airport is located 150 km away.

Description:
Located in the center of Bijeljina just 100 metres from the Main Bus Station, Drina Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a business centre with several conference halls and an on-site restaurant serving local and international cuisine. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Each room comes with cable TV and a minibar, while the bathrooms are fitted with a shower and hairdryer. Free private parking is available on site.

Sauna in the hotels spa centre may be used free of charge.

Tuzla Airport is at a distance of 68 km from the Hotel Drina.

Description:
Featuring ponds, mills, traditional restaurants and a brook, the Ethno Village Stanisici is made up of old original buildings transported to this place from all over Bosnia. The resort includes bungalows, Hotel Pirg, Hotel Ras and Wellness and Spa Center Leonida.

All accommodations, either in small wooden huts or in the Hotel Pirg resembling a medieval castle, are equipped with lots of authentic furniture and have modern bathrooms. They are all air-conditioned and come equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The Ethno Village Stanisici is located on the edge of the city of Bijeljina in the plains of Semberija in the Republika Srpska.

A spa area with an outdoor pool, a hot tub, a sauna and a fitness area offers relaxation after a day of exploring the village and the area.

Traditional Bosnian specialities and international cuisine are served by waiters dressed in ancient costumes in the restaurants of the Ethno Village.

An on-site museum offers an impression about how life was like in Bosnia more than hundred years ago. Children can have fun on the playground or enjoy train rides around the lake. Children under the age of 12 can stay in the spa area until 6 pm.

Description:
Featuring a bar and free WiFi, Hotel ICO is set in Bijeljina. All rooms feature a TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The property has a restaurant.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Each room is fitted with air conditioning, and selected rooms include a terrace. At Hotel ICO rooms include a seating area.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property.

The 24-hour front desk can offer helpful tips for getting around the area.

Banja Koviljaca is 36 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Hotel Dijamant is located in Bileca. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, each room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Dijamant.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and Croatian.

Trebinje is 32 km from the accommodation.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Mt. Bjelanica

Location : When you stay at Hotel Han Bjelasnica in Bjelasnica, you ll be 7 minutes by car from Mt. Igman. This 4-star hotel is 4.3 mi (6.9 km) from Mt. Bjelanica and 12.9 mi (20.8 km) from Sarajevo Tunnel Museum.

Rooms : Stay in one of 55 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Take advantage of the hotel s room service (during limited hours). A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.

Description:
Situated in Bjelanica, 25 km from Ilidza, Green Apartments Bjelanica features ski-to-door access and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. There is also a fridge, stovetop and a kettle.

If you would like to discover the area, skiing is possible in the surroundings.

Sarajevo is 29 km from the apartment, while Jahorina is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sarajevo International, 12 km from Green Apartments Bjelanica, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Green Apartments Bjelanica in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Hotel Blagaj Mostar has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Blagaj. Featuring a garden, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features free shuttle service, room service and luggage storage for guests.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Hotel Blagaj Mostar rooms have bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a continental or halal breakfast.

Staff at Hotel Blagaj Mostar are always available to provide advice at the reception.

Old Bridge Mostar is 12 km from the hotel, while Kravica Waterfall is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mostar International Airport, 4 km from Hotel Blagaj Mostar.

Description:
Apartment Beskid is situated on the bank of Buna River and only 5 km from Mostar International Airport. It offers a 3-bedroom apartment with private garden and free WiFi. Free private parking is available.

Beskid Apartment comes with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living room and a bathroom.

In the beautiful garden there is a porch with a dining area, a barbecue and a childrens swimming pool. From the garden, guests can have direct access to the river.

The village of Blagaj, where the apartment is located, is only 10 km from Mostar and 60 km from the Adriatic sea. Medugorje is 18 km away while Kravica Waterfall can be reached within 42 km. Please inform Apartment Beskid in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set in Buna, 11 km from Old Bridge Mostar, Vila Ivankovic Buna offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are a kids club and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the hot tub, or enjoy river views.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at Vila Ivankovic Buna have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at Vila Ivankovic Buna can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The hotel offers a childrens playground.

Kravica Waterfall is 36 km from Vila Ivankovic Buna, while Muslibegovic House is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Mostar International, 3 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Located on the bank of the Buna River near Mostar, Motel Kolo offers a swimming pool surrounded with a sun terrace, as well as an a-la-carte restaurant and a bar. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property.

All accommodation units are air-conditioned and come with cable TV. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and towels. Some units come with a seating area and a kitchenette.

Other facilities offered include an ironing service and a laundry. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including canoeing and fishing that the property can organise.

The main road from Sarajevo to Split is 1 km from Kolo Motel. The centre of Mostar is located at a distance of 12 km. Mostar Airport is 7 km away.

Description:
Facing the beachfront, Villa Bunski biser offers 5-star accommodation in Blagaj and features a garden, shared lounge and terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Some units at the property feature a patio with a city view.

At the hotel, the rooms come with a wardrobe. Every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Villa Bunski biser have a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Villa Bunski biser offers a continental or halal breakfast.

The area is popular for fishing, and car hire is available at this 5-star hotel.

Old Bridge Mostar is 13 km from the hotel, while Kravica Waterfall is 42 km away. The nearest airport is Mostar International, 5 km from Villa Bunski biser, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

The preferred airport for Luxury villa Imperial - with the vineyard views is Mostar (OMO-Mostar Intl.) - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Description:
HeadLine : Connected to a shopping center

Location : Located in Mostar, Luxury villa Imperial - with the vineyard views is connected to a shopping center, within a 10-minute drive of Old Church of Jajce and Sahat Kula (Watch Tower). This 4-star guesthouse is 20.3 mi (32.7 km) from Medjugorje Shrine and 3.8 mi (6.1 km) from Ottoman Villa.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 2 air-conditioned rooms featuring private pools and flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks.

Dining : Wrap up your day with a drink at the poolside bar.

Description:
Villa Oggi, a property with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a terrace, is situated in Blagaj, 11 km from Old Bridge Mostar, 40 km from Kravica Waterfall, as well as 12 km from Muslibegovic House. This villa has a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

The air-conditioned villa consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are offered in the villa.

Old Bazar Kujundziluk is 11 km from the villa, while St. Jacobs Church is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mostar International, 2 km from Villa Oggi, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Villa Oggi in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Sat 30 Sept 2023 until Tue 30 Apr 2024
A surcharge of EUR 10 applies for arrivals after check-in hours. All requests for late arrival are subject to confirmation by the property.

Description:
Set just 11 km from Old Bridge Mostar, Charming Cottage with Private River Beach offers accommodation in Mostar with access to a garden, a private beach area, as well as a 24-hour front desk. The property features river and garden views, and is 12 km from Muslibegovic House.

The air-conditioned holiday home consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is featured.

The holiday home offers a terrace. A barbecue is available on site and fishing can be enjoyed within close proximity of Charming Cottage with Private River Beach.

Old Bazar Kujundziluk is 12 km from the accommodation, while Mepas Mall is 14 km away. Please inform Charming Cottage with Private River Beach in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Boasting pool views, Villa Idila features accommodation with a balcony and a kettle, around 11 km from Old Bridge Mostar. This villa has a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

The air-conditioned villa consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are offered in the villa.

The villa offers a childrens playground. There is an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace at this property and guests can go fishing nearby.

Kravica Waterfall is 36 km from Villa Idila, while Muslibegovic House is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mostar International, 4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Villa Idila in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set on the banks of River Una and just 200 metres from the border crossing, the stylish Zepter Hotel has elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi, a spa area and 2 restaurants with terraces boasting fabulous river views.

Air conditioning, LCD satellite TV and a balcony or terrace are provided in all rooms, suites and apartments at the Zepter. Free video-surveilled, room service and a panoramic elevator are featured as well.

One of the restaurants serves pizzas, while the other offers an a la carte selection of traditional and international dishes and quality wines.

Hot tub, massage treatments, sauna and steam bath can be enjoyed at an extra charge. The hotel also has a fitness area and a beauty shop.

The conference room has multimedia equipment and can host up to 50 people. Cocktails, weddings, prom nights and other kinds of gatherings can be organised on site. Front desk operates 24 hours a day.

Memorial areas of Jasenovac and Donja Gradina are within a 14 km radius from Hotel Zepter, while Kneica Ethno Village is 15 km away. The nearest access to E70 Motorway, connecting central and southeast Europe, is about 20 km from the hotel. Please inform Zepter Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set in Bosanska Dubica, Hotel Rafaelo offers 4-star accommodation with a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring a garden, the 4-star guest house has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Each room is equipped with a patio.

At the guest house, rooms have a balcony with a city view. At Hotel Rafaelo all rooms include bed linen and towels.

A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

The nearest airport is Banja Luka International, 57 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Managed by a private host

Description:
Boasting a garden and a terrace, Hotel Jelena Brcko is situated in Brcko. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar or a meal at the restaurant. Free WiFi is available and free private parking is provided.

The air conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms come with a seating area. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower while some have a spa bath.

Speaking Serbian, Croatian, Bosnian, English and German at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Airport shuttles can be arranged at an additional charge.

Banja Koviljaca is 65 km away while Vinkovci is 70 km from Jelena Brcko Hotel. The closest airport is Tuzla Airport, 68 km from the property. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Boutique Hotel Nea is located in Brcko. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving European cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel every room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Boutique Hotel Nea the rooms have bed linen and towels.

The nearest airport is Tuzla International Airport, 64 km from the accommodation.
